metadata.description: Relationship 'person_first_last' and all reports and report views.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Reports based on people entered into the system with their first and last training.

configuration.name: display_name
configuration.value: Person with First and Last Training

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The demographic details for this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The district where this person was born.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The latest deployment details for this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The first training this person enrolled in.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The current training disruption for the first training.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The exam details for the first training.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The registration details for the first training.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The training institution where the first training occurred.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The district where the training institution for the first training is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The last training this person enrolled in.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The current training disruption for the last training.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The exam details for the last training.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The registration details for the last training.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The training institution where the last training occurred.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The district where the training institution for the last training is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The passed and registered results for the first training for this person.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: CASE WHEN `first_registration+registration_number` IS NOT NULL THEN 'Passed and Registered' WHEN `first_exam+results` = 1 THEN 'Passed, not Registered' WHEN `first_exam+results` = 2 THEN 'Did not Pass Exam' ELSE 'Did Not Take Exam' END

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Returns 1 if the person is still in their last training and 0 if they have graduated or discontinued training.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: CASE WHEN `last_training+graduation` IS NOT NULL OR `last_exam+exam_date` IS NOT NULL THEN 0 WHEN `last_disruption+disruption_date` IS NOT NULL AND `last_disruption+resumption_date` IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The passed and registered results for the last training for this person.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: CASE WHEN `last_registration+registration_number` IS NOT NULL THEN 'Passed and Registered' WHEN `last_exam+results` = 1 THEN 'Passed, not Registered' WHEN `last_exam+results` = 2 THEN 'Did not Pass Exam' ELSE 'Did Not Take Exam' END

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Reports by person with their first registration.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: A list of all people in the system that completed their first training and were registered in that cadre.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Reports by person with their last registration.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: A list of all people in the system that completed their last (most recent) training and were registered in that cadre.
